levels.title: Beginner's Challenge
levels.description: Start with a simple 3x3 grid and three distinct colors. This is an introductory level designed for new players to learn the mechanics.

levels.title: A Bit More Challenging
levels.description: The grid size increases to 4x4, and you'll need to match more tiles to clear the level. The time limit remains the same to keep the pressure on.

levels.title: Bigger Grid, Higher Goals
levels.description: The grid gets taller, and the goals increase to keep the challenge steady.

levels.title: Tighter Time
levels.description: The grid expands to a 5x5 square, and the time limit is reduced. You'll need to think and act faster to meet the increased tile goals.

levels.title: Wider Grid, More Tiles
levels.description: The grid widens and the goals increase significantly, but with only three colors, you'll find more matches.

levels.title: Larger Goals
levels.description: The grid expands again, and you'll need to hit higher tile goals for each color. The time limit is still tight, so focus on efficiency.

levels.title: The First Real Test
levels.description: The grid gets taller and the time limit decreases. This level is designed to test your ability to make quick, strategic moves.

levels.title: Big Square Grid
levels.description: A big square grid with a tight time limit and high goals. You will have more options to create large combos.

levels.title: Massive Grid, Massive Challenge
levels.description: This is a grueling level with an expansive grid and a short time limit. You'll need to be fast and meticulous to complete all goals.

levels.title: The Ultimate Challenge
levels.description: The final level is an 8x8 grid with the most difficult goals. With a short time limit and only three colors, you will need to find long chains and large matches to succeed.
